tweet: “If you were paying for delivery you need a highly reliable market price. @chainlink helps you create multiple decentralized nodes and data sources so you can eat reliable data to pay someone accurately.” - @SergeyNazarov at #EthCC2019  https://t.co/qq94ZhlupW
